# both

**Type Property**

A value that represents both axes.

## Declaration

```swift
static var both: UIAxis { get }
```

## Constants

- **horizontal**: A value that represents the horizontal axis.
- **vertical**: A value that represents the vertical axis.

items.description: A value that represents the horizontal axis.
items.name: horizontal

items.description: A value that represents the vertical axis.
items.name: vertical
